hints.content:
$\begin{align}
\blue{1+4}&\blue{=2+2}\\
\blue{5}&\blue{=4}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $5$ is not the same as $4$.

$\begin{align}
\pink{1+1}&\pink{=5-4}\\
\pink{2}&\pink{=1}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $2$ is not the same as $1$.

$\begin{align}
\purple{3+3}&\purple{=7-1}\\
\purple{6}&\purple{=6}\\
\end{align}$  
This is true because $6$ is the same as $6$.
